whyblocks.headline: Working with 3rd Party APIs
whyblocks.text: Tina simplifies and speeds up your JAMstack development by integrating with 3rd party data providers. Store your data wherever you see best fit.

whyblocks.headline: Wrap your components
whyblocks.text: Supercharge your existing React component libraries by making them editable by content creators.

whyblocks.headline: Block Based Editing
whyblocks.text: Tina turns your website into a visual composer that empowers editors and designers to intuitively create brand-compliant pages without the need to call a developer.
